properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 1:21PM CST until January 22 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport LA
properties.description:
...A Wintry Mix of Snow, Sleet, and Freezing Rain Possible Tonight
into Wednesday Morning...

* WHAT...Snow, sleet, and freezing rain possible with freezing
rain posing minor impacts.

* WHERE...In Oklahoma, McCurtain County. In Arkansas, Sevier,
Howard and Little River Counties.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Wednesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and sleet after midnight will
gradually transition to freezing rain by daybreak. Up to a
quarter of an inch of snow along with freezing rain
accumulations less than a tenth of an inch on elevated surfaces
may be possible. Motorists should exercise caution on area
roadways due to the potential of freezing rain.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY
